name: wd-import-templates
description: Lambda function that serves cfn templates for account and region importing

scripts.build:zip: zip -rq --exclude=test/* account-import-templates-api.zip node_modules/ && zip -urj account-import-templates-api.zip src/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm ci --omit=dev && npm run copy:global-resource && npm run build:zip && npm run build:dist
